00058    struct ForwardHDSConcept {
00060 
00061 
00065       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00066       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
00067       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::forward_category forward_category;
00069 
00073       void constraints() {
00074          using namespace boost;
00075 
00076          function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00077          function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category
00078                                                        ,forwardS> >();  
00079          const bool is_valid_storage_tag =
00080             is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_sourceS>::value ||
00081             is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_targetS>::value ||
00082             is_convertible<forward_category,next_in_facetS>::value;
00083          BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( is_valid_storage_tag ); 
00084          // Error message could be improved
00085 
00086          h = next_in_facet(hds,h);
00087          h = next_at_source(hds,h);
00088          h = next_at_target(hds,h);
00089          const_constraints(hds);
00090       }
00094       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds){
00095          h = next_in_facet(hds,h);
00096          h = next_at_source(hds,h);
00097          h = next_at_target(hds,h);
00098       }

00102       halfedge_descriptor g;
00104    };
